name: Bubble Shooter Pop 2017 - Ball Shoot Game
name_original: Bubble Shooter Pop 2017 - Ball Shoot Game
description:
Bubble Shooter Pop is the best bubble shoot game!
The most thrilling bubble shooting arcade game is here! Join the action in Bubble Shooter Pop and get ready for some real bubble popping fun Playing is easy! Simply launch bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to the highest score. Have fun,it's free!Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst. Clear all the bubbles to level up,lots of fun levels of puzzles with Bunny In this game you help bunny,come on and enjoy playing with this bubble game as a kid playing and having fun at the school.
HOW TO PLAY?
- Touch the screen to exploit bubbles
- You have to connect 3 or more bubbles

- Don't let the bubbles fill the screen
